__e: Wasn't gonna wear the jacket. The shirt has mustard on the back.
I put mustard on mine like an idiot.
Look at the mustard on my face, but listen to my words.
Which one of them told you?
In his soul, in his heart... in his spirit, in his being... he does not actually feel the white woman... 'cause the white woman ain't hip to mustard greens and cornbread.
I got you mustard and Sauerkraut, just what you like.
